org.richfaces.fragment.inplaceInput

Interface InplaceInput

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RichFacesInplaceInput

    public interface InplaceInput

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TextInputComponentImpl getTextInput()
      Gets the associated text input.
      ConfirmOrCancel type(String text)
      Types given text to the input, thus switching the input into editing state.

    • Method Detail

      • getTextInput

        TextInputComponentImpl getTextInput()
        Gets the associated text input.
        Returns:
        the text input of the component
        See Also:
        TextInputComponentImpl

      • type

        ConfirmOrCancel type(String text)
        Types given text to the input, thus switching the input into editing state.
        Parameters:
        text - text to be typed into the input
        Returns:
        object by which a user can actually change the input value (confirm), or return to the previous text (cancel)
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if typing to the input have switched the inplace input to an editing state
